original: Lundin, Oscar Rudolf, läroverksadjunkt, Göteborg, f. 10/7/90 i Råda, Gbgs o. Boh. 1. — Stud:ex. v. Gbgs latin 10, fil. kand. i Gbg 15, fil. mag. 16, provår v. Gbgs real 22-23. E. o. lär. i Västerås 20-21, Borås 21-22, Jönköp. 23-31, adj. v. Malmö realsk. 30, adj. i hist. m. samh :lära o. geogr. v. Majornas h. a. 1. i Gbg sed. 38.
translated: Lundin, Oscar Rudolf, high school teacher, Gothenburg, b. 10/7/90 in Råda, Gothenburg and Bohuslän County, 1. — Graduated from Gothenburg Latin School in 1910, bachelor's degree in Gothenburg in 1915, master's degree in 1916, trainee teacher at Gothenburg Real School in 1922-1923. Substitute teacher in Västerås in 1920-1921, Borås in 1921-1922, Jönköping in 1923-1931, teacher at Malmö Real School in 1930, teacher in history, social sciences, and geography at Majorna's Higher School since 1938.

workExperience.position: Teacher in History, Social Sciences, and Geography
